docs.title: Kicad to Producation
docs.text: This project aims to provide an easier way to export all required documentation and production files, for my own personal process streamlining.

docs.title: Requisites
docs.text:
What features I want this project to have

S/N Feature Directory Status 1 Perform Checks docs/checks/ - 1.1 Schematics ERC report ✅ 1.2 PCB drc report ✅ 2 Exporting Schematics docs/sch/ - 2.1 in: PDF, SVG format ✅ 2.2 Collate all SVG pages into a markdown doc ✅ 3 Exporting PCB docs/pcb/ - 3.1 3D image in: png format, in multiple angles (top, bottom, overview) 3.1 in: step format step/ ✅

What pre-processing features I want implemented

SN Feature Description Plugin Status 1 Cleaning of PCB remove all reference silkscreen Hide References 2 Exporting to JLCPCB export pcb gerbers in JLCPCB format Fabrication Toolkit 3 Exporting ibom export pcb to interactive bom Interactive Html BOM 4 Exporting board as pdf export pcb to pdf format Board2Pdf
